A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: An absolute disgrace to one of the better film franchises... genuinely cringing at the dialogue\, abysmal acting and cheesy one-liners... *Spoiler* but imagine Luke Skywalker saying 'See ya around\, kid' as his parting words? Absolutely shocking beyond belief. In fairness\, visually it is a beautiful film\, it's got some decent moments and good action in parts\, but I digress... whoever cast/wrote this series of Star Wars films should be fired immediately\, ruining everything good about the film. I've never seen such a beta\, embarrassing and utterly unenjoyable sith than Kylo Ren... Disney need to take a good long hard look at themselves after this\, and look at what they are tainting.
